alwaysWatchHere.title: Always open YouTube videos here
alwaysWatchHere.note: label text for a checkbox that enables this feature for all videos, not just the current one

keepEnabled.title: Keep Duck Player turned on
keepEnabled.note: label text for a checkbox that enables this feature for all videos, not just the current one

openInfoButton.title: Open Info
openInfoButton.note: aria label text on a button, to indicate there's more information to be shown if clicked

openSettingsButton.title: Open Settings
openSettingsButton.note: aria label text on a button, opens a screen where the user can change settings

watchOnYoutube.title: Watch on YouTube
watchOnYoutube.note: text on a link that takes the user from the current page back onto YouTube.com

invalidIdError.title: ERROR: Invalid video id
invalidIdError.note: Shown when the page URL doesn't match a known video ID. Note for translators: The <b> tag makes the word 'ERROR:' bold. Depending on the grammar of the target language, you might need to move it so that the correct word is emphasized.

signInRequiredError.title: We are not able to connect you with this video

signInRequiredErrorTip1.title: If you use a VPN, try turning it off and reload the video.
signInRequiredErrorTip1.note: A tip on how to solve the bot detected error

signInRequiredErrorTip2.title: If turning off the VPN doesnâ€™t work, you can view this video on YouTube without the added privacy features of Duck Player.
signInRequiredErrorTip2.note: A tip on how to solve the bot detected error

blockedVideoError.title: YouTube has blocked this video in Duck Player
blockedVideoError.note: Message for when the video is blocked by YouTube

blockedVideoErrorMessage.title: View this video on YouTube without the added privacy features of Duck Player.
blockedVideoErrorMessage.note: A suggested solution to the blocked video error is to watch it directly on YouTube. This message suggests that as a solution to the user.

tooltipInfo.title: Duck Player provides a clean viewing experience without personalized ads and prevents viewing activity from influencing your YouTube recommendations.
